MovieSeen.overview: After raising an unnervingly talented spider in secret, 12-year-old Charlotte must face the truth about her pet and fight for her family's survival.
MovieSeen.title: Sting

MovieSeen.overview: Following their explosive showdown, Godzilla and Kong must reunite against a colossal undiscovered threat hidden within our world, challenging their very existence – and our own.
MovieSeen.original_title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
MovieSeen.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

MovieSeen.overview: All of the Clow Cards have been captured, and Sakura Kinomoto, the new Master of the Cards, is preparing to play the lead in the play for the town festival. However, a new evil force is causing mysterious events all over Tomoeda, including the disappearance of Sakura's cards. With Syaoran's help, Sakura must figure out the cause of these events, and save her town.
MovieSeen.original_title: 劇場版 カードキャプターさくら 封印されたカード
MovieSeen.title: Cardcaptor Sakura: The Sealed Card

MovieSeen.overview: An alcoholic, abusive ne'er-do-well is shown the error of his ways through a legend that dooms the last person to die on New Year's Eve before the clock strikes twelve to take the reins of Death's chariot and work tirelessly collecting fresh souls for the next year.
MovieSeen.title: The Phantom Carriage

MovieSeen.overview: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story is a movie based on the life story of world-renowned neurosurgeon Ben Carson from 1961 to 1987.
MovieSeen.original_title: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story
MovieSeen.title: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story

MovieSeen.overview: Set ten years after the events of the original, James Cameron’s classic sci-fi action flick tells the story of a second attempt to get the rid of rebellion leader John Connor, this time targeting the boy himself. However, the rebellion has sent a reprogrammed terminator to protect Connor.
MovieSeen.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
